24/7 patrol

FOOT PATROL

REQUEST A QUOTE

DO I NEED FOOT PATROL?

It depends on your security needs or if you need more ground covered. Hiring Foot Patrol is the best choice is you’re looking to protect your family and house or improve your business and make it a safer place to be in.

Houses are tended, not only to criminal activities, but fires and other dangerous situations. Our Foot Patrol can deter and prevent. You will rest assure you are in the best hands. 24/7 Patrol’s hands.

WHAT IS FOOT PATROL?

Our officers have the ability to secure all aspects of your business from the inside and out.

24/7 Patrol service is fully committed to keep you safe by making a number of visits each day to check the properties, including grounds.
Foot Patrol allows the security guards to maintain a visible presence to deter any dangerous situation or criminal activity.

WHAT CAN OUR FOOT PATROL DO FOR YOU?

24-hour constant surveillance

Recognize safety hazards

Rapid response in case of emergencies

Provide a safe community and work place

Lock and unlock property

Performance interior evaluations

WHY 24/7  PATROL?

24/7 Patrol is dedicated to protect you. We’ll listen to your needs, identify your security goals and develop a customized security plan to help you succeed.

 

Also, you can count on a professional management who will give you constant reports, keep you updated at every moment and provide you outstanding results.

Better security coverage

Visible crime deterrent

Highly trained patrol officers

Quick response

Cost-effective solution
